description: A small bob is firmly tied via two strings to a post. As the rod is spun on its axis with constant rotational speed, the bob reaches the equilibrium position shown, where ฮธ=45ยบ. Ignoring the weight of the bob, draw its FBD at the moment in time shown.
hints: The ball has a centripetal acceleration
Tension always pulls: i) along the rope, and ii) away from the system.
